content.question: In the Arena (Scrovegni) Chapel, Giotto used which of the following?

choices.label: Fresco, the application of pigment onto damp plaster
Mosaic, the application of colored tesserae to wet plaster
Glazing, the application of thin, transparent layers of paint
Impasto, the thick, textured application of paint

content.answer: Fresco, the application of pigment onto damp plaster

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
